title: Train model fail with cryptic message
body:
Newbie using Ludwig for training a simple comment analysis with 4 columns
I am getting the error below 


`u18:~/ludwig$ ludwig train --data_csv /home/moooo/ludwig/androidcomments.csv -mdf /home/moooo/ludwig/model_definition.yaml
 _         _        
ludwig v0.1.0 - Train

/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/train.py:149: YAMLLoadWarning: calling yaml.load() without Loader=... is deprecated, as the default Loader is unsafe. Please read https://msg.pyyaml.org/load for full details.
  model_definition = merge_with_defaults(yaml.load(def_file))
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/moooo/.local/bin/ludwig", line 11, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 86, in main
    CLI()
  File "/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 64, in __init__
    getattr(self, args.command)()
  File "/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/cli.py", line 70, in train
    train.cli(sys.argv[2:])
  File "/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/train.py", line 663, in cli
    full_train(**vars(args))
  File "/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/train.py", line 149, in full_train
    model_definition = merge_with_defaults(yaml.load(def_file))
  File "/home/moooo/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ludwig/utils/defaults.py", line 156, in merge_with_defaults
    output_type_registry[model_definition['output_features'][0][
KeyError: 0
`
yaml file content is shown below:
`input_features: 

   name: version
   type: category

   name: device
   type: category

   name: review
   type: text

output_features:

   name: rating
   type: category  
   
training:
 epochs: 10`

Any ideas what is wrong?
